泴字的基本解释

泴
guàn
古同“盥”。

泴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guàn］
［《廣韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
［《廣韻》古滿切，上緩，見。］
亦作“泴1”。
(1)洗手，以手承水冲洗。
(2)洗涤。
(3)除；净。
(4)古代洗手的器皿。
(5)祭名。灌祭。酌酒浇地降神。
(6)泛指浇灌。

泴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泴； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页619第09
【字彙補】居玩切，音貫。淨也，澡手灑也。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】有崇泴。○按卽盥字之譌。

泴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泴字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
guàn
Gu Tong "washing".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guàn］
["Guangyun" antiques cut, change it, see you. ]
["Guangyun" ancient full cut, slow up, see you. ]
Also known as "Yi 1".
(1) Wash your hands and rinse with water.
(2) Washing.
(3) Except; net.
(4) Ancient hand-washing utensils.
(5) The name of the sacrifice. Consecration. Sacrifice your spirits with a drink of wine.
(6) Refers to watering in general.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泴; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 619 09
【Vocabulary Supplement】July play and cut, sound through. Jing Ye, shower hands and shower.　Another name. 【Song History · Clan Table】There is Chongjing. ○Press 卽譽譌字之譌.
